Title: MyStoreFront
Description: MyStoreFront is a storefront designed to creat product pages from an xml file. It intergrates with the Mals-e shopping cart. Plans for future features include a full shopping cart, the ability to intergrate with other shopping carts, addons, themes/skins, and inventory management/accounting.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
MyStoreFront is a storefront designed to creat product pages from an xml file. It intergrates with the Mals-e shopping cart. Plans for future features include a full shopping cart, the ability to intergrate with other shopping carts, addons, themes/skins, and inventory management/accounting.

Download the current release - 0.2 Alpha
